title: "Former Tesla employees brought stolen documents to self-driving startup Zoox"
excerpt: "Self-driving startup Zoox has admitted that four of its employees took confidential documents from their previous employer Tesla, according to a statement issued after the company settled a lawsuit this week over the matter."
